00050 #include "Mixture/RandomVector.h"
00051 #include "Array/ArrayOp.h"

00053 template < class T >
00054 class MixtureModel : public RandomVector< T >
00055 {
00056   public:
00057 
00058     virtual ~MixtureModel( ) { }
00059 
00060     virtual double p( const Array< T >&, unsigned ) const = 0;
00061 
00062     virtual void resize( unsigned n, bool copy = true )
00063     {
00064         a.resize( n, copy );
00065     }
00066 
00067     virtual void normalize( )
00068     {
00069         double suma = sum( a );
00070         //FLOAT_CHECK( suma )
00071         if( suma != 0 )
00072             a /= suma;
00073     }
00074 
00075     virtual void initialize( )
00076     {
00077         double sum = 0;
00078         for( unsigned i = a.nelem( ); i--; sum += ( a( i ) = uni( ) ) );
00079         a /= sum;
00080     }
00081 
00082     double p( const Array< T >& x ) const
00083     {
00084         double px = 0;
00085 
00086         for( unsigned i = size( ); i--; )
00087                                 {
00088             px += a( i ) * p( x, i );
00089                                 }
00090 
00091         //FLOAT_CHECK( px )
00092         //RANGE_CHECK( px >= 0 )
00093         return px;
00094     }
00095 
00096     double p( unsigned i, const Array< T >& x ) const
00097     {
00098     //  return a( i ) * p( x, i ) / p( x );
00099         double pxi = a( i ) * p( x, i );
00100         double pix = 0.;
00101 
00102         for( unsigned j = size( ); j--; )
00103             pix += j == i ? pxi : a( j ) * p( x, j );
00104 
00105         //FLOAT_CHECK( pxi )
00106         //FLOAT_CHECK( pix )
00107         //RANGE_CHECK( pxi >= 0 )
00108         //RANGE_CHECK( pix >= 0 )
00109         return pxi > 0 ? pxi / pix : 0;
00110     }
00111 
00112     double p( unsigned i ) const
00113     {
00114         return a( i );
00115     }
00116 
00117     //
00118     // select a model randomly equal probability
00119     //
00120     unsigned sampleModelUniform( )
00121     {
00122         return unsigned( uni( ) * size( ) );
00123     }
00124 
00125     //
00126     // select a model randomly with p( i )
00127     //
00128     unsigned sampleModel( )
00129     {
00130         unsigned i;
00131         double   u = uni( );
00132         double   s = 0;
00133 
00134         for( i = 0; i < size( ) && u >= a( i ) + s; s += a( i++ ) );
00135         if( i == size( ) ) i = size( ) - 1; // should never happen
00136 
00137         return i;
00138     }
00139 
00140     //
00141     // select a model randomly with p( i | x )
00142     //
00143     unsigned sampleModel( const Array< T >& x )
00144     {
00145         unsigned i;
00146         double   pi;
00147         double   u = uni( );
00148         double   s = 0;
00149 
00150         for( i = 0;
00151              i < size( ) && u > ( pi = p( i, x ) ) + s;
00152              s += pi, ++i );
00153         if( i == size( ) ) i = size( ) - 1; // should never happen
00154 
00155         return i;
00156     }
00157 
00158     double modelEntropy( const Array< T >& x ) const
00159     {
00160         unsigned i, k;
00161         double   px, h;
00162         Array< double > pxi( size( ) );
00163         Array< double > s  ( size( ) );
00164 
00165         //SIZE_CHECK( x.ndim( ) == 1 || x.ndim( ) == 2 )
00166 
00167         if( x.ndim( ) == 2 ) {
00168             for( s = 0, k = 0; k < x.dim( 0 ); ++k ) {
00169                 for( px = 0, i = 0; i < size( ); ++i )
00170                     px += ( pxi( i ) = a( i ) * p( x[ k ], i ) );
00171                 for( i = 0; i < size( ); ++i )
00172                     s( i ) += pxi( i ) / std::max( px, /*MIN_VAL !!!*/ 1e-100 );
00173             }
00174             s /= double( x.dim( 0 ) );
00175         } else {
00176             for( px = 0, i = 0; i < size( ); ++i )
00177                 px += ( pxi( i ) = a( i ) * p( x, i ) );
00178             for( i = 0; i < size( ); ++i )
00179                 s( i ) = pxi( i ) / px;
00180         }
00181 
00182         for( h = 0, i = 0; i < size( ); ++i )
00183             if( s( i ) > /*MIN_VAL!!!*/ 1e-100 )
00184                 h -= s( i ) * log( s( i ) );
00185 
00186         return h;
00187     }
00188 
00189     double& prior( unsigned i )           { return a( i ); }
00190     double  prior( unsigned i ) const     { return a( i ); }
00191     const Array< double >& prior( ) const { return a;      }
00192 
00193     unsigned size( ) const { return a.nelem( ); }
00194 
00195   protected:
00196     Uniform uni;
00197     Array< double > a;
00198 
00199     MixtureModel( unsigned size = 0, RNG& r = RNG::globalRng )
00200       : RandomVector< T >( r ), uni( 0, 1, r ), a( size )
00201     {
00202         if( size ) a = 1. / size;
00203     }
00204 };
